attributes.action: Ban alcohol and tobacco due to the very high health risks.
attributes.additional_details: Recently the government advised the UK that cannabis will not be made legal due to the health concerns involved. With this approach in mind, here is a petition to ban alcohol and tobacco also due to the very high health concerns.
attributes.background: Referring to the governments latest response on legalising cannabis and the very high health risks it contains, here is a petition to ban other deadly and more toxic substances.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106715

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
